metadata.title: CVE-2024-53164 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: sched: fix ordering of qlen adjustmentChanges to sch->q.qlen around qdisc_tree_reduce_backlog() need to happen_before_ a call to said function because otherwise it may fail to notifyparent qdiscs when the child is about to become empty.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53164` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.11.0-14-generic - 6.11.0-14.15
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-14-generic - 6.11.0-14.15
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-14-generic-64k - 6.11.0-14.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1008-azure - 6.11.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1007-gcp - 6.11.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1008-lowlatency - 6.11.0-1008.8
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1008-lowlatency-64k - 6.11.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1010-oracle - 6.11.0-1010.10
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1010-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.11.0-1007-raspi - 6.11.0-1007.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.11.0-14.15').
linux-aws package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-1008.8').
linux-azure package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.11.0-1008.8').
linux-gcp package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.11.0-1007.7').
linux-lowlatency package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.11.0-1008.8').
linux-oracle package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.11.0-1010.10').
linux-raspi package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.11.0-1007.7').
